MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk affecting properties in Bothkennar and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.04pm. Our engineers have arrived on site in the area, however repairs are taking longer than expected due to the repairs required on the overhead line network, following reports of low conductors at Powfoulis Lodge and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.27pm on Friday 6th November 2020.
